languages.text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Expeditious Reload{/g} will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.
languages.original_text: Быстрая перезарядка также {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовой{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатель{/g}. Однако при стрельбе он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −25% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Expeditious Reload will also reload the prow lance weapon. However, that weapon will suffer a -25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.
Expeditious Reload will also reload the prow lance weapon. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.

languages.text: Быстрая перезарядка также {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовой{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатель{/g}. Однако при стрельбе он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −25% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g}.
languages.original_text: Expeditious Reload will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.

traits.locale_text: Быстрая перезарядка также {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовой{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатель{/g}. Однако при стрельбе он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −25% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g}.

Быстрая перезарядка также {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовой{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатель{/g}. Однако при стрельбе он получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −25% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Zügiges Nachladen{/g} lädt auch die {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffe{/g} im {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} nach. Allerdings erhält diese Waffe einen zusätzlichen Abzug von −25 % auf die Trefferchance beim Schießen.
languages.original_text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Expeditious Reload{/g} will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.

traits.locale_text: Zügiges {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Nachladen{/g} lädt auch die {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffe{/g} im {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} nach. Allerdings erhält diese Waffe einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −25% auf die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} beim Schießen.

languages.text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Rechargement rapide{/g} recharge également la {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g}. Cependant, cette arme subit une pénalité supplémentaire de −25 % en termes de chances de toucher lors d'un tir.
languages.original_text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Expeditious Reload{/g} will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Rechargement{/g} Rapide recharge également la {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance{/g} l'arme de la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g}. Cependant, cette arme subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} supplémentaire de -25 % en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g}lors d'un tir.

languages.text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}急速装填{/g}还可以重新装填{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}。不过，通过这种方式装填的光矛武器，命中率会额外降低25%。
languages.original_text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Expeditious Reload{/g} will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.

traits.locale_text: 急速{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}装填{/g}还可以重新装填{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}。不过，通过这种方式装填的光矛武器，{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}会额外降低25%。

languages.text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Recarga acelerada{/g} también recarga el {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}arma de lanza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g}. Sin embargo, esa arma sufrirá una penalización del −25 % adicional a la probabilidad de impacto al disparar.
languages.original_text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Expeditious Reload{/g} will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Recarga{/g} acelerada también recarga el {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}arma de lanza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g}. Sin embargo, esa arma sufrirá una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del −25 % adicional a la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} al disparar.

languages.text: 迅速なリロードで{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}のリロードもできる。ただし、武器を発射する際、命中率が追加で25％減少するペナルティを受ける。
languages.original_text: Expeditious Reload will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.

traits.locale_text: 迅速なリロードで{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}のリロードもできる。ただし、武器を発射する際、命中率が追加で25％減少するペナルティを受ける。

languages.text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Tez Doldurma{/g} kabiliyeti, ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}pruva{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}mızrak silahını{/g} da doldurur. Ancak bu silah, ateşleme sırasında vuruş olasılığına −%25 ek ceza puanı alır.
languages.original_text: {g|f:9c115131f98f4273af06890aa9d558d2}Expeditious Reload{/g} will also reload the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g}. However, that weapon will suffer a −25% extra penalty to hit chance when shooting.
